54345600510083072.text: ordered 20 pizzas for LDSConf tonight and the satellite feed still is failing. looks like people are filtering out.. anyone want pizza?

1452489387.text: president eyring has a special place in my heart, especially after he made fun of my hometown's name... :D

4604326853.text: what? anti Mormon protestors didn't come out during the rain? I strongly question their commitment!!

11551780526.text: pasting together wedding announcments while watching LDSConf.

11559037001.text: not wearing a tie to LDSConf priesthood session (on campus, no time to go get one). hope I don't get kicked out...

11938780582.text: Overall it's a pretty decent app. Some of the custom UI stuff is quirky, but I love the multiple tabs. No music for hymns though? :(

1447380379.text: looking forward to spending my LDSConf weekend all from the comfort of my own home. going in person is nice but tires me out.

1451905347.text: up, debating if I should get dressed and find some breakfast before LDSConf starts. kind of enjoying my bed right now though.

1452084021.text: the online feed of LDSConf apparently has a lag. twitter told me who the new apostle was before president monson did!

1452195079.text: time to get back into making a budget. its easy not to think about it as a single person without debt. need to prepare now!

1452223107.text: check out the LDSConf twitter chatter at http://search.twitter.com/search?q=%23ldsconf

1452463992.text: messages i need: during times of distress we need to focus on keeping our covenants -elder christofferson.

1452590295.text: good session of conference. two hours to rush around and get as much done as i can before 2 pm!

1454249479.text: just got my seat at the mariott center for priesthood session of LDSConf. signing off twitter for the next two hours.

1457549811.text:
> "discipleship is a journey... not a spectator sport"

 -- pres uchtdorf

1457669950.text:
> "follow the prophets, keep an eternal perspective, have faith, be of good cheer"

 -- elder snow

1459203157.text: LDSConf was good, heard a number of things i needed to hear. thankful i have six months to study it all or else i would be overwhelmed!

1830064787.text:
"if you could hie to kolob."

Filed under "hymns that make no sense if you just sing the first verse"

2068654292.text: if you ever need a lifetime supply of mustard or ketchup, just check the fridge of any Mormon church.

2069066884.text: protip: a lesson starts quickly losing value when it goes overtime and gets rushed. end on time, keep the spirit.

4587097075.text: personal God: one of the fundamental truths that exists outside of empirical evidence and beyond limited human logic.

186494829964967936.text: I love what science has taught us about the wonders of this universe created through the Big Bang and evolution. I'm a Mormon.

186139122786779136.text: Cold and rainy Saturday morning with LDSConf streaming on the laptop. Seriously, could there be a more perfect time to fold laundry?
